Package index

All functions

day_summary_info_to_col()
Converts a daily summary 'infos' item to a dataframe
get_day_summary()
Get day summary as a list
get_day_summary_table()
Get a daily summary for a plant as a data.frame
get_flow()
Get current power flow information for a plant
get_plants()
Get details of power plants associated with a Sunsynk account
get_token()
Get a token for authenticating to the Sunsynk API
plot(<sunsynkr_day_summary_table>)
Plots the sunsynkr daily summary table
print(<sunsynkr_flow>)
Print a representation of the power flow to the console
print(<sunsynkr_plants>)
Print Sunsynk API plants
print(<sunsynkr_token>)
Print details of Sunsynkr token
